ygData.subject: Re: Problems connecting
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes I had the exact same error. It was cause by my screen resolution being 32 bits when my game resolution was set to 16 bits. You can set the graphics
ygData.messageBody:
Yes I had the exact same error. It was cause by my screen resolution
being 32 bits when my game resolution was set to 16 bits.
You can set the graphics resolution once your in the game, but to get
in the game try setting your display to 16 bits, 32 bits etc until
one works.

Hope that solves your problem.

Wes


--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Steven R. Hulse" <steveh@m...>
wrote:
> Hi gang,
> I have recently installed a new HD in my PC and re-installed
EQ.
> Now whenever I go to log in and play it tells me that "eqgame.exe
has
> generated errors and is being closed by Windows." This is only when
I go
> to play, I can get into chat fine. I have un-installed and re-
installed
> EQ twice and I still get the error. Has anyone else been getting
this
> message or does anyone have any ideas how to fix it? All my drivers
are
> up to date btw.
>
>
> Thanks!
> Durgaa
